headline: Evaluating Nike (NKE) Shares As Recent Trading Choppiness Highlights Valuation Premium
summary: Why NIKE (NKE) is in Focus Today NIKE (NKE) is back on many watchlists after recent trading left the share price at $63.63, with performance showing a mix of positive and negative returns across different time frames. See our latest analysis for NIKE. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 1 day share price return of 1.17% decline and a 7 day share price return of 4.03% decline, contrasting with a 30 day share price return of 8.38% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 11% decline. headline: WPP’s CTO says AI is reshaping advertising. But creative judgment needs to remain in human hands
summary: The ad giant has encouraged its workforce to embrace AI tools and is investing in training to ensure workers understand their critical role in the creative process.

headline: Nike shakes up regional leadership team
summary: Company veterans Carl Grebert and Angela Dong will leave as CEO Elliott Hill works to improve performance across geographies.
